Products and packages

Si sine causa? quae fuerit causa, mox videro; interea hoc tenebo, si ob rem aperiam eaque ipsa, quae ab illo inventore veritatis et impetus quo enim maxime placeat, facere possimus, omnis voluptas nulla pariatur? at magnum periculum adiit in quo voluptas sit, aspernatur aut dolores.

Navigation Packages

We offer a range of ways to buy your navigation supplies to suit every operational and procurement requirement.

Voyager Navigation as a Service

The power of software and data analytics and cost price navigation supplies to enable shipping companies to significantly reduce navigation spend.

Learn more

Voyager Pay As You Sail

Annual subscription makes all ENCs open in ECDIS and Voyager Planning Station for planning purposes. Only pay for charts when the keel cross into the ENC.

Learn more

Voyager Fixed Price Bundle

Highly accurate fixed price for navigation supplies to provide budget certainty and easier navigation management.

Learn more

Voyager ECDIS as a Service

Everything you need for safe, compliant ECDIS navigation for one cost-effective monthly fee.

Learn more

Voyager On-Demand

Manual ordering and management of navigation supplies. ENC subscription periods of 3, 6, 9 and 12 months. Puts the office in control 2 with web-based approval function.

Learn more

Voyager FLEET INSIGHT provides a full overview of fleet position, navigation compliance as well as purchasing, digital product usage and service management to help make ship management, navigation and compliance management and purchasing related tasks simpler, more efficient and more cost-effective.

Try for free

Compare packages and features

Choose from 4 package options to meet your navigation needs or buy individual modules to meet your specific fleet requirements.

Voyager PLANNING STATION provides an easy and cost- effective solution for the complex and time-consuming task of managing electronic and traditional navigation onboard. Choose from 4 package options to meet your navigation needs or buy individual modules to meet your specific fleet requirements.
